articles.title: Meryl Streep, Christine Baranski, and Audra McDonald toast to Stephen Sondheim in their bathrobes - Daily Mail
articles.description: The famous trio sipped on cocktails and wine during a performance of Ladies Who Lunch from the musical Company. Lounging around in their robes, they looked like they were living the dream.
articles.content:
